text:
True AI - trueai.io | Central London, UK | ONSITE | Full Stack Developer | £40,000-£60,000

Excited about newest AI breakthroughs? Curious about the startup environment? Want a bot that will actually learn what your family members want to hear? If at least 2 of your answers are yes, you might be in the right place!

We are looking for a Full Stack Developer who is passionate about taking AI to the next level, and who is interested in building the company alongside the founders. You will play a key role in the development of what our users see and interact with and you will integrate that with our deep learning algorithms in the backend.

More info: http://trueai.io/careers-fullstack/
